title: Leauge ranked bugsplat and repair and afks
body: I have had two games now witch i have lost with no chance two win the first one we had our premade bot go afk after four minutes so we had no chance to remake and the second one i had thee game bugsplat and repair and before i was able to go in it had been remaked and i lve lost lp. I find this very annoying and irritating.

replies.body: Getting losses as a result of the bugsplat sucks, and I don't recommend queuing up for matchmaking until this gets fixed up.  I highly recommend running through each step of our [game crash](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes+) guide to help troubleshoot this towards a fix, as this is likely caused by game file, driver, or issues with settings.  I hope that helps!
